ygData.subject: Trouble Logging in
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi gang, I m frustrated. I just picked up the Platinum pack, installed it and double clicked on the exe icon. The game starts to load, goes throught the
ygData.messageBody:
Hi gang,
I'm frustrated. I just picked up the Platinum pack, installed it and
double clicked on the exe icon. The game starts to load, goes throught
the download screen and then I get an error that eqgame.exe has
generated errors and I will need to restart the game.

Ti's been a while since I played and have decided to get back into it
however I can't seem to get it going. so the first question I have is
where does the error log go to? I want to view it and see if it tells me
what the problem is.

I have shut off Norton, set Zone Alarm to "low" and turned orr port
blocker. Can anyone else think of something that may be the cause?

Thanks!
Steve
